name: Epocria
description:
Epocria
An infinite open world survival game for 1-8 players to explore. Journey into the deepest caves, enter alternate dimensions, and release an ancient evil's grasp on the world of Epocria.

Epocria is the result of over two years of development from one man. I have put in countless hours refining the games content and making it an enjoyable experience. This includes a multitude of boss fights, enemies and items. Another important feature to the gameplay is the dimension system and worlds to explore, visit the Underworld, Dig to the deepest caves or even remain in the Overworld. The choice is yours to explore.

The Demo
The full game takes place within a randomly generated world, however inside the Epocria demo you will experience many features Epocria has to offer. Including crafting, building, weapons enemies and boss fights. Taking place inside of a dungeon you must equip yourself with the strongest magical and technological weapons to defeat what lies within.

Key Features
  • Open world sandbox.
  • Infintely generated worlds.
  • Magic and technology.
  • Unique dimensions and events.
  • Dozens of items, enemies and boss fights.
  • Lots of unique weapon types to fit many different play styles.
  • Singleplayer or Multiplayer Co-op PvE (1-8 Players)
